title: Holly Hobbie
overview: Holly Hobbie might appear to be just a young farm girl living in small-town U.S.A, but on the inside, she's a hero for our time. Now that Holly's hit her teens, helping others is more complicated than it looks. From saving her grandma's caf√©, to supporting her bestie and navigating young love, Holly may save the world someday, but she's going to start with her own small town.
